subject: RE: Ticket Received - Information regarding order: SSN4743
description_text:

I just received my order, and There are missing stuff in package, I dit not received the accessory kit of plate (heel plate / heighttening plate / base plate) so I cannot fix it...
How can we do ?

Regards,

--
Alexandre

Objet : Ticket Received - Information regarding order: SSN4743

conversations.body_text: Hello, please provide your detailed shipping information and a picture of the missing item, and we will resend it to you.  Hi Alexandre URBAN,

Hello,

I cannot provide picture, of missing part, as I dont received it...
Order: SSN4743, you can check tracking, I just received the item.

Its the accessory kit to mount the heel plate / heightening plate / base plate which are missing (I received in the package the heel plate / base plate and heightening)

[cid:1aed702e-ed62-4d05-ac40-a23912cd500c]

Red stuff are missing for example.

Regards,

--
Alexandre

________________________________
De : support@simsonn.com
Hi Alexandre URBAN,  Please take a photo of all the items you received. I will check which parts are missing and arrange for them to be sent to you immediately.

Hello.  See attached.

Regards.


________________________________
De : support@simsonn.com
Hi Alexandre URBAN, The last image was not uploaded completely. Could you please send it again?

Is it better now ?

Regards
